data.name: Minute of Islands - Digital Artbook
data.detailed_description:
The Minute of Islands Digital Artbook consists of 24 double pages and contains artworks and sketches produced before and during the development of the game. Additional commentary gives exclusive insight into the development.

To locate the artbook on your computer after the purchase, find the game in your Steam Library and click "Browse local files" in the "Manage" dropdown menu.
